summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4826 for the improvement of the alley in block 7, Crane's Addition, being the alley from East John Street to East Thomas Street, between 17th Avenue North and 18th Avenue North, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55663, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
